creator: GoFar
descriptionHtml:
Shudder is one of the most challenging scary games.

You woke up in this horrific place. It seems to be a hospital or a morgue. You found a strange note: "Follow the pictures". You should collect them all and find out what's going on here!

It won't be easy, you need to hide and seek, find the keys for locked doors, take a lot of challenges... But be quiet, the granny is chasing you.

If you're looking for new creepy scary games, granny games or hide and seek games to give you goosebumps, don't miss our Shudder.
descriptionShort: The evil granny is chasing you in this horror nightmare. It will be a dead hunt!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Shudder is a new scary game.
